text: Hello, Mrs. Stevens. My name is Jane Phillips. I'm the personnel director.
speaker: INTERVIEWER
reasoning: Introduces themselves and asks initial question

text: I'm pleased to meet you. Please have a seat. Thank you.
speaker: CANDIDATE
reasoning: Responds with gratitude and acceptance of introduction

text: According to your resume, you have several years of office experience.
speaker: INTERVIEWER

text: Yes, I've had over 10 years experience. Tell me about your qualifications.
speaker: CANDIDATE

text: I can type over 100 words per minute. I'm proficient in many computer programs.
speaker: INTERVIEWER

text: I see that you have excellent references. Do you have any questions about the position?
speaker: INTERVIEWER

text: Yes. What are the responsibilities in this position?
speaker: CANDIDATE
reasoning: Asks about job responsibilities and requirements

text: We're looking for someone to supervise two office clerks. Handle all the correspondence, arrange meetings, and manage the front office. Have you had any supervisory experience?
speaker: INTERVIEWER

text: Yes. I supervised three administrators in my last position.
speaker: CANDIDATE

text: What are the office hours, Mrs. Phillips?
speaker: INTERVIEWER

text: 830-430, with an hour off for lunch. What are your salary expectations, Mrs. Stevens?
speaker: CANDIDATE
reasoning: Responds with job expectations and salary requirements

text: I expect to be paid the going rate for this type of position. Can you tell me about the benefits you offer?
speaker: INTERVIEWER

text: Yes. We provide full medical and dental coverage, a pension plan, and a three-week holiday per year.
speaker: CANDIDATE

text: That's very generous. When is the position available?
speaker: INTERVIEWER
reasoning: Asks about the candidate's availability and next steps

text: We're hoping the successful applicant can start at the beginning of next month.
speaker: CANDIDATE

text: We'll finish our interviews tomorrow and make a decision by the weekend. We'll contact you next week.
speaker: INTERVIEWER

text: Thank you very much. It's been a pleasure meeting you. I hope to hear from you soon.
